channel.title: Open-Source Observability | SigNoz
channel.description: SigNoz is an open-source observability tool to help you find issues in your deployed applications & solve them quickly. It provides logs, metrics, and traces under a single pane of glass. Built with ClickHouse as datastore, it is designed to handle enterprise scale.
channel.item: https://signoz.io/blog/challenges-in-choosing-a-monitoring-tool-for-fintech-companies-in-india Challenges in Choosing an APM tool for Fintech Companies in India due to RBI Guidelines https://signoz.io/blog/challenges-in-choosing-a-monitoring-tool-for-fintech-companies-in-india undefined Mon, 24 Apr 2023 00:00:00 GMT address@yoursite.com (SigNoz Inc) APMSecurity
